short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Play Numberle Wordle game | A daily number game

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Numberle is a math numble game inspired by the popular wordle game that gained popularity in early 2022. In Numberle, your objective is to correctly guess a mathematical equation within 6 attempts.

 As you input your guesses, colored hints will guide you towards the solution, turning rows green when you've correctly solved the puzzle.
